title: When You’re Raring to Go 2
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Haah~.... Aqours’ live show’s video is the best….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Rin-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>….Nyaaa---!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>W-, what’s wrong!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Even though Rin was supposed to do a “reconnaissance” and report back to Nico-chan, Rin really wants to do a live right away nya!! How about you, Shizuku-chan!? Don’t you feel the same!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I also feel the same way. It makes me want to do a live!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin knows a good park nya. Let’s go there and sing~! Rin loves Nijigaku’s songs so Rin wants to try singing them<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I-, I’ll sing my own songs, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Let’s make it so the first one to reach the park gets to sing first. Let’s go nyaa--!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
